; Variables
brk_flag EQU $10

*=$F000
reset:
 LDA #$10
 LDX #$10
 LDY #$10
 BRK
endless_loop:
 jmp endless_loop


*=$F100
nmi:
 ; non maskable interrupt
 PHA
 TXA
 PHA
 TYA
 PHA

 LDA #$0E
 STA $00

 ; restore registers
 PLA
 TAY
 PLA
 TAX
 PLA

 ; return from nmi
 RTI



*=$F10F
irq:
 ; save registers
 PHA
 TXA
 PHA
 TYA
 PHA

 ; pop the status register to determine
 ; if we ended up here from a BRK or not.
 ; status reg is the last thing pushed to
 ; stack but to ensure we dont F up we
 ; have to immediately push it pack
 ; after popping it off.
 PLA
 PHA

 ; check if we were called from BRK
 AND #brk_flag
 BEQ from_irq

from_brk:
 ; call came from BRK
 LDY #$0B
 STY $00
 JMP continue

from_irq:
 ; call came from hardware
 LDY #$0C
 STY $00

continue:
 ; restore registers
 PLA
 TAY
 PLA
 TAX
 PLA

 ; return from irq
 RTI


*=$FFFA
 .word nmi
 .word reset
 .word irq

 Binary:
 A9 10 A2 10 A0 10 00 4C
 07 F0 00 00 00 00 00 00
 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
